properties.name: Neulinetreneu Healing Spring
properties.legend: This legendary water source is whispered about in ancient tales and believed to possess mystical properties. The spring emanates crystal-clear water, shimmering with an otherworldly iridescence that sparkles even in the dimmest light.

properties.name: Hidanoscas Bridge
properties.legend: A lengthy bridge spans over the Chetida River near Hidanoscas.

properties.name: Vida Bridge
properties.legend: A formidable bridge spans over the Dubnokisov River near Vida.

properties.name: Hirviio Bridge
properties.legend: A stone bridge spans over the Mindsgyarca River near Hirviio.

properties.name: The Distant Tavern
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious mashed chevon with purple gin is served here.

properties.name: The Big Inn
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside inn. Delicious braised chevon with shiny beer is served here.

properties.name: The Yellow Goat
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious flame-broiled melon with dark tequila is served here.

properties.name: The Major Boar
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside inn. Delicious cured boar with bitter rom is served here.

properties.name: The Far Tiger
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious dried tiger with hot cider is served here.

properties.name: The Bright Crocodile
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious dry-aged pigeon with bitter juice is served here.

properties.name: Harmerstet Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Gorodnomel Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Ororovsk War. 
Date: March 28, 618 Yeyad Era.

properties.name: Koura Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Zholian Conflict. 
Date: September 14, 523 Yeyad Era.

properties.name: Dichinotin Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Moraletean Invasion. 
Date: January 3, 800 Yeyad Era.

properties.name: Ramou Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Vileaux-Boesian War. 
Date: February 7, 865 Yeyad Era.

properties.name: Dungeon
properties.legend: Undiscovered dungeon. See One page dungeon

properties.name: Totrexe Monster
properties.legend: Old sailors tell stories of a gigantic sea monster inhabiting these dangerous waters. Rumors say it can be 10 m long.

properties.name: Laures Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Soumi Spirits.

properties.name: Olinote Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Soumi Spirits.

properties.name: Santiruera Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Old Astellian Beliefs.

properties.name: Korodno Panthers
properties.legend: A gang of forest brigands.

properties.name: Hvamstan Lions
properties.legend: A gang of forest brigands.

properties.name: Meverkavo Rats
properties.legend: A gang of forest bandits.

properties.name: Chern Beavers
properties.legend: A gang of mounted bandits.

properties.name: Pirates
properties.legend: Pirate ships have been spotted in these waters.

properties.name: Pirates
properties.legend: Pirate ships have been spotted in these waters.

properties.name: Pirates
properties.legend: Pirate ships have been spotted in these waters.

properties.name: Ruined Castle
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient castle. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Pyramid
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient pyramid. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Sacred site
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient sacred site. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Sacred site
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient sacred site. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Apen Library
properties.legend: A vast collection of knowledge, including many rare and ancient tomes.

properties.name: Travelling Magical Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this magical circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Travelling Wonderous Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this wonderous circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Goloka Tournament
properties.legend: Warriors from around the land gather for a tournament of cunning in Goloka, with fame, fortune and favour on offer to the victor.

properties.name: Troeiras Fair
properties.legend: A fair is being held in Troeiras, with all manner of local and foreign goods and services on offer.

properties.name: Minor Jetty
properties.legend: A small location along the Partyn River to launch boats from sits here, along with a weary looking owner, willing to sell passage along the river.

properties.name: Boars migration
properties.legend: A huge group of boars are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Vegoresk dance
properties.legend: A dance has been organised at Vegoresk as a chance to gather the suspected revolutionaries of the area together to be merry, make alliances and scheme around the crisis.

properties.name: Cenco Graveyard
properties.legend: An eerie necropolis where nature intertwines with death. Overgrown tombstones are entwined by thorny vines, and mournful spirits wander among the fading petals of once-vibrant flowers.
